name: analyze_abr_waveform_p1_metrics
description: Extracts P1 amplitude and latency from Auditory Brainstem Response (ABR) waveform data.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: time_ms
inputs.description: Time points of the ABR recording in milliseconds

inputs.name: amplitude_uv
inputs.description: Amplitude values of the ABR recording in microvolts

output.description: Research log summarizing the analysis steps and results, including P1 amplitude and latency
